name: GovEagle
headline: First draft of a government RFP response in 60 min
description: GovEagle is building an AI RFP automation platform for medium to large government contractors. Using GovEagle, contractors have been able to submit more proposals without compromising quality.

founders.name: Akash Mandavilli, Founder
founders.description: Akash is currently the co-founder of GovEagle. Before GovEagle, Akash was a Product Manager at Meta working on virtual reality co-presence and WhatsApp ads. Akash also spent time at IBM working on federal sales operations and predictive analytics. Akash graduated from Johns Hopkins with a degree in Economics and Computer Science.

founders.name: Gabe Villasana, Founder
founders.description: Gabe is the cofounder and CTO of GovEagle, an AI platform to help government contractors win more awards. Prior to GovEagle, Gabe was the founding ML engineer for Stripe's Financial Crimes team and has led ML research at Johns Hopkins Wilmer Eye Institute.

## Proposals for government contractors in hours not days
Ensure compliance, find knowledge across your files, and generate first drafts in hours.
###### Get started

###### Core features
###### Core features
### Supercharge your GovCon's proposal efforts
GovEagle's AI-based RFP Automation suite merges your team's field-specific knowledge with advanced generative AI.
###### Get started
###### Get started
###### [Explore security postureExplore security posture](https://www.goveagle.com/<./#security-1>)
#### Generate a compliant first-draftin 60 minutes not 60 hours
###### GovEagle works alongside your team from compliant outline all the way to final output. 
Shred the RFP, PWS, and more to generate a full compliance matrix and outline
Shred the RFP, PWS, and more to generate a full compliance matrix and outline
Shred the RFP, PWS, and more to generate a full compliance matrix and outline
Uses your past proposals, capture material, white papers, and more to ensure relevant responses

Uses your past proposals, capture material, white papers, and more to ensure relevant responses
Get drafts in your own templates, style, and voice
Get drafts in your own templates, style, and voice
Get drafts in your own templates, style, and voice
Microsoft Word Add-On to quickly edit and ask questions
Microsoft Word Add-On to quickly edit and ask questions
Microsoft Word Add-On to quickly edit and ask questions
###### Find anything from yourfiles in seconds
GovEagle’s Chat allows you to find excerpts from past proposals, applicable past performance, relevant resumes, and more.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FY43KhQK409N2JWOJS18ZLUt8Z4.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FY43KhQK409N2JWOJS18ZLUt8Z4.jpg)
###### Proposal review to catch blindspots and suggest quality improvements
GovEagle’s Proposal Review checks your entire proposal to ensure you're fully compliant. Additionally, it will suggest quality improvements to impress your customers.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yJPHKotipwaT9TCLuzmniD3YhOY.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/yJPHKotipwaT9TCLuzmniD3YhOY.jpg)
###### See all features
###### See all features
### A Powerful Suite of Features
GovEagle's feature set is tailored for the GovCon industry to work with existing tools, processes, and systems.
###### Get started
###### Get started
###### Integrate with your existing tools
GovEagle supports integrations with Sharepoint, SalesForce, Hubspot, Box, and many more of the tools you use every day.
###### Word Add-On
GovEagle's Word Add-On let's you quickly make edits and find information so you can go from red-team to finish line in no time.
###### RFP Shredding
GovEagles proprietary document parsing technology will pull in any and all requirements including Sections L and M.
###### AI Learning Capabilities
As you continue to use GovEagle, it will become better at outputting drats that exceed your quality bar.
###### Compliant Outline
GovEagle outputs a fully compliant outline including writing plan, necessary requirements to fulfill, relevant internal documents, and knowledge gaps.
###### Instant Redraft
GovEagle enables you to add new documents, knowledge, or RFP amendments to instantly redraft the whole proposal or just a section.
###### Security
###### Security
###### Security
### The highest security and compliance
###### NIST 800-171 Compliant
GovEagle is fully NIST 800-171 compliant allowing us to handle, store, and process CUI and other sensitive information.
###### FedRAMP High
GovEagle runs in FedRamp High environments ensuring your data is secure and protected.
###### Strict AI Policies
GovEagle has zero data retention agreements with AI providers and does not use your data to train models.
###### Data Encryption
All GovEagle Data is encrypted at rest and in-transit ensuring your data is never exposed.

generated_description:
GovEagle is a fledgling company, established in 2022, that’s making waves in the government contracting space. Their mission? To arm contractors with the ability to draft government RFP (Request for Proposal) responses in just 60 minutes—a remarkable feat that significantly accelerates the proposal process compared to traditional approaches.

The core of GovEagle’s offering is an AI-driven automation platform tailored specifically for medium to large government contractors. It enables users to rapidly create compliant, high-quality proposals without sacrificing the standards that such important documents require. Essentially, by leveraging advanced generative AI, the platform allows contractors to crank out more proposals, thereby increasing their competitiveness in a notoriously demanding market.

The company is positioned within Y Combinator's Batch W23, which speaks volumes about its potential. With a compact team of just two employees, they’re already making strides in the industry thanks to the leadership of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. 

What’s particularly impressive about GovEagle is its robust feature set, which includes powerful tools for parsing RFP content, proposal reviews to identify blindspots, and drafting compliance matrices. Furthermore, the platform seamlessly integrates with popular business tools like SharePoint and Salesforce, enhancing its practicality for users.

GovEagle takes security seriously as well. It boasts compliance with the NIST 800-171 standard and operates in a FedRamp High environment, ensuring that sensitive data is handled securely. Plus, they uphold strict privacy policies, which is essential when dealing with government contracts.

For government contractors looking to streamline their proposal processes, GovEagle presents a compelling platform to elevate their efforts, ensuring they can make high-quality proposals swiftly. To learn more or get started, you can check out their website at [GovEagle.com](https://www.goveagle.com/).
